name: Free Foxy from Fox Jail
description:
Foxy the fox is about that life. Foxy committed the crimes, but Wendy the Wizard isn't about to let her pet rot. Wendy's on a mission to save her pet fox.

Simple puzzle platformer for the GDevelop Jam. Toggle crates and release the gates to allow Foxy to escape.

Controls
WASD: Move
Space/LMB: Toggle Crates
R: Reset Wizard

Liluo.io Link
https://liluo.io/games/691c8e0d-fb70-4486-a3ce-a04d6415bd2b
